Configuration.Name: p1_19250_NOAP
Configuration.SetupScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.1) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(19250,0) # Drive guide to p1 config driveGuide('p1') # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for p1) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 95.0494) sics.set('beamcenterz', 94.1318)

Transmission.SetupScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(51, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(210) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator

Scattering.SetupScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(51, 0) driveBsz(249.0)
